com.ibm.lpex.alef
Class LpexTextViewer.WidgetCommand

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.lpex.alef.LpexTextViewer.WidgetCommand
Enclosing class:
LpexTextViewer
protected class LpexTextViewer.WidgetCommand
extends java.lang.Object

Represent a replace command that brings the TextViewer's StyledText text widget back in sync with the TextViewer's IDocument after the document has been changed.
